entry.title: neuherbs Organic Apple Cider Vinegar with Mother
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Vinegar
Price: 325.00 - 599.00 (2 variants)

Organic Apple Cider Vinegar has been used for a variety of health-promoting properties since ancient times. neuherbs Organic Apple Cider Vinegar with mother enzyme uses natural fermented apple juice and is true to its nature. It is perfect for your journey to comprehensive good health.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Apple Cider Vinegar for Weight Management

    Apple Cider Vinegar helps suppress unwanted hunger cravings, that can keep you fuller for longer and thus assist in weight management.

  • Apple Cider Vinegar for Blood Sugar Management

    Apple Cider Vinegar is known to help improve insulin sensitivity that helps manage blood sugar levels post high-carb meal.

  • Apple Cider Vinegar For Skin & Hair

    Apple Cider Vinegar helps maintain skin’s Ph level and works as a great natural hair conditioner.

— Key Ingredients —

  • Apple Cider Vinegar with Mother

    To deliver you benefits of good gut enzymes.

  • Raw, Unfiltered, Unpasteurized

    To deliver the natural health benefits of Apple Cider vinegar

  • Preservative Free

    To deliver you a quality product.

— How To Use —

  • Take 2 tsp (10 ml) of neuherbs Apple Cider Vinegar

  • Add it to a glass of water 250 ml

  • Take it twice a day before your heavy meals

  • Does it come in a glass bottle?

    Yes, neuherbs Organic Apple Cider Vinegar comes in a non-porous, non-leaking hygienic glass bottle to provide you with a good quality product.

  • Does it contain Vitamin C?

    Yes, Apple cider vinegar is fermented juice from crushed apples. Like apple juice, apple cider vinegar may contain nutrients such as B vitamins and vitamin C.

  • What is its shelf-life?

    neuherbs Organic Apple Cider Vinegar with mother is best before 18 months from the date of manufacture.

  • Is it a certified organic product?

    Yes, neuherbs Organic Apple Cider Vinegar with Mother is a certified organic product that is certified by USDA Organic, Onecert Organic, and India Organic.

  • Does it taste like apple?

    No, apple cider vinegar is made up of fermented apple juice which maked it acidic in nature or taste for better health benefits.

  • I am having sensitive teeth how can I use this ?

    Apple Cider Vinegar can be consumed by straw, if one is not able to drink it directly.

  • Does it create acidity in the body?

    Apple Cider Vinegar is naturally acidic in nature, which should not be consumed empty stomach if one is already suffering from acidic issues.

— Key Benefits —

  • Apple Cider Vinegar for Weight Management

    A daily dose of Apple Cider Vinegar helps suppress appetite, support weight loss, while keeping you feeling better each day.

  • Apple Cider Vinegar for Blood Sugar Management

    Delivers benefits of Apple Cider Vinegar for improved insulin sensitivity & manage blood sugar levels during a high-carb meal.

  • Apple Cider Vinegar for Digestion

    The mother enzyme in this helps keep your digestion well & good.

— Key Ingredients —

  • Raw & Organic

    To deliver you the natural gift of mother earth.

  • Mother Enzyme

    To deliver gut-friendly bacteria

  • Preservative Free

    To deliver you a quality product.

— How To Use —

  • Take 2 tsp (10 ml) of neuherbs Apple Cider Vinegar

  • Add it to a glass of water 250 ml

  • Take it twice a day before your heavy meals

  • Does it contain a mother of vinegar?

    Yes, neuherbs Apple Cider Vinegar with Mother of vinegar contains mother (good gut bacteria), which can be seen settled at the bottom of the bottle with a murky fiber-like appearance.

  • Does it contain alcohol?

    neuherbs Apple Cider Vinegar With Mother is a non-alcoholic beverage and is made from fermented apple juice.

  • Can it be applied to the face?

    Yes, you can try using it as a toner along with consuming it on regular basis for better results.

  • Is it good for maintaining stomach ph?

    Yes, apple cider vinegar is useful for maintaining gut ph. Also, the mother enzyme can be useful for better digestion.

  • Can it be consumed by a 14-year-old child?

    No, as per recommendation it can be consumed by people above 18 years of age.

  • I am a nursing mother can I take it?

    No, as per recommendation pregnant and lactating mothers should not consume apple cider vinegar due to it's natural acidic nature which can cause gastric issues.

neuherbs Apple Cider Vinegar filtered uses raw fermented apple juice. This apple cider vinegar benefits you in managing a healthy lifestyle easily.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Apple Cider Vinegar for Weight Management

    A daily dose of Apple Cider Vinegar helps suppress appetite, support weight loss while keeping you feeling better each day.

  • Apple Cider Vinegar for Hair & Skin

    Apple Cider Vinegar possess anti-bacterial & anti-fungal properties that helps remove dandruff & works as skin toner

  • Apple Cider Vinegar for Dressing

    Apple Cider Vinegar makes a great salad dressing and an easy way to take advantage of its knwon health benefits

— Key Ingredients —

  • Raw

    To deliver you the natural gift of mother earth.

  • Plant-based

    To deliver the natural taste with intact nutrients

  • Preservative Free

    To deliver you a quality product.

— How To Use —

  • Take 1 tsp (5 ml) of neuherbs Apple Cider Vinegar

  • Sprinkle it to your veggies or fruits salad

  • Relish the benefits

  • Is it edible?

    Yes, neuherbs Apple Cider Vinegar is edible and is made from fermented apple juice without the use of any flavor, color, additives, and is allergen friendly.

  • How does it smell?

    neuherbs Apple Cider Vinegar has a natural and unique odor due to its acidic nature.

  • Can we keep it in the refrigerator?

    Yes, you can keep it in the refrigerator. It is recommended to store in a cool & dry place away from sunlight.

  • Can I apply it directly on my face?

    No, due to its acidic nature it should be first diluted with water & then applied to skin.

  • Can I use it for cleaning purpose?

    Yes, this Apple Cider Vinegar is raw & can be used for various cleaning purposes say kitchen shelf etc.

  • What is its shelf-life?

    The shelf-life of neuherbs apple cider vinegar filtered is 18 months from the date of manufacture.
